title: Most miserable countries in the world 2018
summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Misery index score in the y axis.
The maximum Misery index score 1746439.1 is found at Country Venezuela and the minimum is found at Paraguay where Misery index score is 22.9.
There is a difference of 1746416.2 between the maximum Country Venezuela and minimum Country Paraguay.
